key_risks: Market volatility and economic sensitivity due to fluctuations in property prices, interest rates, and consumer confidence
Regulatory and environmental risks from changes in government policies and environmental regulations
Retail sector challenges from the rise of online shopping and changing consumer behavior
controversies: Trademark dispute with Lifestyle Communities over the use of the term 'Lifestyle Communities'
Ongoing legal and regulatory compliance risks
environmental_issues: Environmental concerns including land use, water management, and carbon emissions
governance_issues: Ethical standards and professional requirements management

sources.title: Property company Stockland pays five infringement notices for selling ...
sources.snippet: Property company Stockland Corporation Ltd (Stockland) has paid penalties totalling $100 000 after the AER issued it with five infringement notices for allegedly selling electricity at a shopping centre in New South Wales and four other sites in Queensland, including two retirement villages without holding a retail authorisation or exemption.
